item.title: Adaptive Learning Model
item.description: ANGAZA ADAPTIVE LEARNING MODEL The aim of this system is to optimize content to adjust for the learner’s goals and current state of knowledge. The system decides which content to show the learner based on the trained data from the Angaza Elimu DB. And determines what learning path that a student should be put on based on the Item Response theory. Table of Contents Feature Selection Feature Validation Automation Pipeline APIs Setting Up Running Tests
